name: Dragon Terror
desc: You are uneasy and fearful from a Dragon's mighty presence

name: Dragon Boost
desc: You are filled with the power of Dragons.
apply_message: You let out a mighty roar as you are filled with the power of Dragons!
remove_message: The Draconic energy fades from within you.

name: Dragon Acid burn
desc: Burned with a black dragon's acid

name: Lesser Dragon Acid burn
desc: Burned with a less potent version of a black dragon's acid
